description.value: This value set includes all international curated set of gene identifiers in HGNC

copyright.value: It is a condition of our funding from NIH and the Wellcome Trust that the nomenclature and information we provide is freely available to all. Anyone may use the HGNC data, but we request that they reference the 'HUGO Gene Nomenclature Committee at the European Bioinformatics Institute' and the website where possible
